"In this section you will find general instructions for the menu, for more detailed instructions consult the dedicated sections inside.
Cards Management and display of Loyalty Cards and Cards
Edit shifts From this setting it is possible to add or remove individual shift times.
Make shifts rotation From this setting it is possible to create the rotation of shifts in the desired year or period. It is possible to have different shifts in different periods.
Instruction This Window
Backup From here you can save a copy of all application data inside the device.
Restore This setting allows you to retrieve previously stored application data.
About version From here you can check the various updates of the application.
Credits This option allows you to view any rights of third-party program authors.
App permissions From here you can access the permissions granted on your device.
Privacy information This section contains all information relating to privacy.
Exit With this button you quit the application."

"In this window you can add cards and Green Cards or search for a card.
Search To search for a card, enter the letters contained in the search box, the filter is automatic.
Add It is possible to add a card to the list using the button next to the question mark with three dashes and +.
Delete To delete an element from the list, swipe the element to the left.
Sort To sort the list, hold down the item and move it to the desired position.
Modify To edit an item or view photos simply touch an item in the list, the edit window will open."
" Cumulative update to 2024 to comply with Play Store policies "
"To review this message and all application updates check in the 'Settings' - 'About Version' section"

" Ver. 8.01 * Cumulative update to 2024 to comply with Play Store policies
Ver. 8.00 * Cumulative update to 2023 to comply with Play Store policies
Ver. 7.04 * It is no longer possible to save cards without having given the name to it. * The UPC-A format barcode reading error has been corrected. * Added the ability to change the font size in the calendar.
Ver. 7.03 * The menu for automatically creating annual holidays has been added to the main window. * Monthly statistics have been added, you will be able to more easily check permits and overtime.
Ver. 7.02 * All buttons have been integrated into the top bar * Statistics have been added (window only) * The descriptions of the side menu have been shortened * Card animations have been optimized
Ver. 7.01 * Completely modified the graphic interface by creating the navigation menu * Added left and right scrolling to change months * Minority bugs fixed
Ver. 6.62 * Fixed visibility cards in edit mode
Ver. 6.61 * Fixed crash when swiping left * Added revision notes to application update
Ver. 6.6 * The display modalities of the cards have been corrected * Added the deletion of notes directly in the menu * Note, Overtime and Permit flags update instantly.
Ver. 6.5 * The ability to upload photos from the gallery has been added to the Loyalty Cards. * The problem of immediate saving of 'Long Description' and 'Short Description' in 'Edit Shifts' has been resolved. * Fixed 'Long Description' deletion with empty 'Short Description' in the shift list. * Added titles to all info windows.
Ver. 6.4 * Shifts even if canceled remain in the calendar. * The possibility of storing cards locally has been added. * Moved OK information dialogs. * Increased visibility of notes. * Fixed problem of not displaying multi-lines in notes. * Fixed problem of possible note modification after selection change. * Added automatic cell selection to the long click on the calendar. * Added information windows on the various app tabs. * Added privacy window before accessing the room. * Added privacy button in the menu.
Ver. 6.3 * Added automatic restart to manual upload of backups. * Added automatic backup on uninstall. * Added external access for saving files. * Added check of dates before shifts creation. * Added manual backup and restore. * Fixed bug of overwriting new shifts.
Ver. 6.2 * modified shift rotation creation dialog.
Ver. 6.1 * Added backup and restore menus (not active). * Added shift rotation creation dialog.
Ver. 6.0 * Added description information. * Fixed the English version. * Fixed sequence reset in case of elimination of all rotation turns.
Ver. 5.0 * Information and Credits menu added in Settings. * Fixed bug in inserting new shifts higher than the tenth. * Fixed possible crash in case of wrong shift reading in shift creation. * Fixed possible crash in case of wrong shift reading in main.
Ver. 4.0 * Added overtime and holidays. "

"In this window you can add and edit card data.
Description Enter a full description for the card, it will be displayed in the list.
View the photo If you are only viewing the photos you can open the original photo by clicking on it.
Change your card Click on the button with the pencil to enable the changes.
add a photo Click on 'camera photo' to take a photo.
Add a Barcode or QR Code Click on the dedicated button to acquire a Barcode or QR Code
Orient the photo Click on the circular arrows to orient the photo at will.
Save your changes Click on the disk to save. "
"Some of the icons used are available for free under the gpl license from Fontawesome"

"In this window it is possible to generate the time sequence of the shifts.
In the list on the left is the sequence of rotation of the shifts. In the list on the right is the list of available shift styles. Clicking on an element in the left column will remove the touched element, while clicking on an element in the right column will add the touched element to the left column.
Default sequence At the first start, the application has preset a three-week shift with reverse scrolling. The first week is set as 06-14 shift with Saturday and Sunday off, the second week is 22-06 shift with Saturday and Sunday off, the third week is preset as 14-22 shift with Saturday and Sunday off. If you have a shifts of this type, it is sufficient that you set the first 06-14 as the starting date and any day as the final date, the software will automatically set the entire period with the shifts.
Sequence generation Suppose we want to create a two-day shift with a 6-14 shift and an empty shift. A shift of this type is called sliding because it does not last seven days. 1) Always clicking on the elements of the left column we remove all the elements; 2) Click in the left column twice on the 06-14 shift and once on the empty shift; 3) We modify the initial and final date of the shift considering that the first day selected will be the one with which we start the shift 06-14. "

"In this window it is possible to add, remove or modify individual shift times. Styles are used to generate style-based turn rotations. For example, in the rotation of shifts it will be possible to add a model style to the week. By clicking on the line of the shift concerned, it will be possible to change the style of the single shift.
New style To create a new turn style click on the button with the three dashes and the plus.
Modification / deletion To modify / delete it click on the turn and find the icon to delete it (trash can icon). "
"In this window it is possible to check the statistics relating to shifts. It is possible to move between the months using the arrows at the top or choose a date from the calendar using the month."
Shifts rotations with leaves, overworks and notes
Only the list of shift styles
For more information and to oppose the use of data send an email to condominioledimore@gmail.com.
You must grant write permissions to store data

" You must grant camera permissions to insert the photo. The images will only be stored locally on the device and will not be used for statistical purposes.
The information taken from the camera has the function of taking the identification code of the Application in order to synchronize the devices.
The camera through the ZXing Software fetches the App code which will be stored on a remote site.
The code (generated randomly) will be used to generate end-to-end encrypted information exchange keys.
Only the last exchange message between synchronized devices is stored on the server.
Statistical analyzes on the quantity and quality of connections made in order to improve the service may be carried out."
You must grant permissions to read the external files
Single click on cell to select, long click for see the options

"In this window you can view and edit the calendar data. Using the arrows or with the side scroll function it is possible to quickly change the month, by clicking on the text 'TODAY' you will be brought back to the current day, by clicking on the date it is possible to choose any date. from the side menu of the three dots it is possible to automatically generate holiday (if the Holiday Shift has not been canceled) and change the font size"
"Holiday style is missing, you need to set a long description shift equal to 'Holiday' in order to create annual holidays."
"You need to visually check the card. Is the first visible digit on the card a zero?"
